Alaris.Irc.DccUserInfo

Alaris.Irc.DccUserInfo Class Reference

This class encapsulates all the information known about a remote user in the context of a DCC session. More...

Detailed Description

This class encapsulates all the information known about a remote user in the context of a DCC session.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

Alaris.Irc.DccUserInfo.DccUserInfo ( Connection  connection,
string  nick 
)

Create an instance that represents a user.

Parameters:
connection The IRC server connection which the remote user is on.
nick The remote user's nick.

Member Function Documentation

override string Alaris.Irc.DccUserInfo.ToString (  ) 

A friendly representation of this object.

Returns:
The remote's user nick and his IP address, e.g. Nick@192.168.0.23

Reimplemented from Alaris.Irc.UserInfo.

Here is the call graph for this function:

Property Documentation

Connection Alaris.Irc.DccUserInfo.Connection [get]

The connection representing on which IRC server the remote user can be found.

A read-only instance of Connection

int Alaris.Irc.DccUserInfo.Port [get]

Read only property that returns the port of the connection to the remote user.

This will be a listen port if the remote user was the initiator of the session or else it is simply a client port.

The port as an integer. Will return -1 if the session has not yet been opened.

IPAddress Alaris.Irc.DccUserInfo.RemoteAddress [get]

Read only property that returns the IP address of the remote user.

An instance of IPAddress or null if the session has not been opened.

IPEndPoint Alaris.Irc.DccUserInfo.RemoteEndPoint [get]

The remote users TCP/IP information.

A read-only instance of IPEndPoint
